A1.name: Wood Staff
A1.description: A beautiful wood staff made from the famous Ygg-drasil, The Life tree.

A2.name: Void Staff
A2.description: A staff who was forged in the void. The power it contains are frightening.

A3.name: Gao's Staff
A3.description: This staff apparently is the property of Madam Gao from the Marvel universe. It is full of Ancient oriental magic.

A4.name: Staff of the Rising sun
A4.description: This staff contains the energy of a Thousand stars. Tips : don't forget the sun screen while wielding it.

D1.name: Robe of Novice
D1.description: A basic robe that all beginners mages should have back at home.

D2.name: Nether Robe
D2.description: This robe comes from an other dimension. It is said that it will increase your magic powers .. and your appetite. Well, why not...

D3.name: Dumbledore's Robe
D3.sprite: Articles/DumbledoreRobe.png> 500 blocked 0.2 defense You're a Wizard Harry! No one knows why this robe is available at this shop but it's a good one.

D4.description: This Robe was given to the Archmages of the Winterhold Academy. It is said that you can handle all kinds of magic with it.

S1.name: Fart and Ignite
S1.description: After years of training, you are able to control your farts and ignite them to burn down tons of enemies. TONS.

S2.name: Book of Geb
S2.description: The ancient egyptian god beholds a ancestral spell capable of destroying all enemies around you.

S3.name: Reality distortion
S3.description: Neo's training made you able to bend the reality of the matrice in such ways that you can wipe out entire groups of enemies.

S4.name: Pyroblast
S4.description: The famous spell of Antonidas, After ignoring you for a whole year he decided to teach it to you.
